title: How to understand and solve engineering mathematics easily - Quora

response.answer_text: the best is to prepare in advance prior to taking the math class. Scour the material for possible problems that may hang you up in the classroom real time experience. Then take notes and skip four lines then tape record the class and transcribe what you missed into those four lines. Do your schoolwork and grade it like a test. Sort out the problems that you’ve got right the first time and put them aside, the idea is you’ll never miss them on a test. The remaining problems that you did miss make a smaller footprint target to review and to concentrate and focus on. Evaluate the body of missed problems if there are several that are basically the same Learning issue. This strategy reduces the footprint of the target remaining to master.

You must understand logic and the basics of math. You have to be as comfortable with math as a mechanic with a wrench. LEARN THE BASICS and you can always go back to solve the problem. Learn how to solve “word” problems quickly. All real world problems ARE WORD problems. When you are on the job, the boss is not going to give you a list of equations to solve. You must do that yourself,.
